CT_RegEx 0.003<RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000001VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|^([:lower:])TXT|Line start with SmallcaseISR|TrueSNS|TrueDUA|TrueLB1|Join the Line Up with spaceMD1|1RP1| $1DR1|LSL1|1LB2|Join the Line Up without spaceMD2|1RP2|$1DR2|LSL2|1</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000002VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|,$TXT|Line end with commaISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|Join the Line DownMD1|1RP1|, DR1|RSL1|1LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000003VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|^([»,\?!\.])TXT|Line start with punctuation (not «)ISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|Join the Line UpMD1|1RP1| $1DR1|LSL1|1LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000004VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|([^\.»\?”\:\!…,"’])$TXT|Line end without punctuationISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|Join the Line DownMD1|1RP1|$1 DR1|RSL1|1LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000005VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|-$TXT|Line end with -ISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|TrueLB1|Delete - and join the Line DownMD1|1RP1|DR1|RSL1|1LB2|Join the Line Down with -MD2|1RP2|-DR2|RSL2|1</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000006VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|^$TXT|Empty LineISR|TrueSNS|FalseDUA|FalseLB1|DeleteMD1|2RP1|DR1|LSL1|0LB2|MD2|1RP2|DR2|LSL2|0</RegEx><RegEx>KEY|RE_DEFAULT_000007VSB|TrueTYP|1FND|^ +TXT|Line start with
